mapper.sql: id, account, device_mac, device_code, device_name, game_code, game_name,game_process ,report_time,run_count,create_time,update_time
mapper.update: update game_run_record set run_count = #{runCount}, update_time = now() where DATE(report_time) = DATE(#{reportTime}) and account = #{account} and device_mac = #{deviceMac} and device_code = #{deviceCode} and game_process = #{gameProcess}
mapper.select:
select
from game_run_record where DATE(report_time) = DATE(#{reportTime}) and account = #{account} and device_mac = #{deviceMac} and device_code = #{deviceCode} and game_process = #{gameProcess} order by id limit 1

SELECT account, device_code, device_mac, report_time, game_code, game_process, SUM(run_count) run_count FROM game_run_record WHERE 1=1
and account = trim(#{record.account})
and device_code = trim(#{record.deviceCode})
and device_mac = trim(#{record.deviceMac})
and game_code = trim(#{record.gameCode})
and game_process = trim(#{record.gameProcess})
GROUP BY account, device_code, device_mac, game_code, game_process, report_time order by report_time desc,run_count desc

SELECT * FROM game_run_record WHERE 1=1
and device_code = trim(#{record.deviceCode})
and device_mac = trim(#{record.deviceMac})
and game_code = trim(#{record.gameCode})
and game_process = trim(#{record.gameProcess})
and TO_DAYS(report_time) = TO_DAYS(#{record.reportTime})
SELECT game_code, SUM(run_count) run_count FROM game_run_record WHERE device_code = #{deviceCode} GROUP BY game_code
SELECT account, game_code, SUM(run_count) run_count FROM game_run_record WHERE account = #{account} GROUP BY account,game_code

SELECT game_code, SUM(run_count) run_count FROM game_run_record WHERE device_code = #{record.deviceCode}
and game_name = trim(#{record.gameName})
and game_code = trim(#{record.gameCode})
GROUP BY game_code order by run_count desc
